description: Updates the state of a user's approval on a pull request. The user is derived from the signed-in account when the request is made.

parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the revision.

parameters.name: approvalState
parameters.description: The approval state to associate with the user on the pull request.
